home.hero_Description: An all-in-one cybersecurity awareness platform that trains, tests, and measures employee behavior to reduce human risk and build a strong security culture.
home.keyBenefits_Description: Discover what makes us the right choice for your security needs.
home.keyBenefit_Card1_Description: Human error remains one of the leading causes of cyber incidents. SECURESIST helps organizations reduce human cyber risk by identifying vulnerabilities in employee behavior and addressing them before they lead to breaches.
home.keyBenefit_Card2_Description: Cybersecurity awareness is only effective when it can be measured. SECURESIST enables organizations to test employee responses through realistic attack simulations and continuously assess security awareness levels.
home.keyBenefit_Card3_Description: Technology alone is not enough. SECURESIST helps build a lasting security culture where cybersecurity becomes part of everyday behavior, not just a policy.
home.whyChooseBenefit_Card1_Description: Interactive, role-based awareness training that teaches employees how to recognize real cyber threats.
home.whyChooseBenefit_Card2_Description: Realistic phishing and social engineering simulations to test employee readiness.
home.whyChooseBenefit_Card3_Description: Behavioral insights that highlight risks, trends, and improvement areas.
home.whyChooseBenefit_Card4_Description: Ongoing training and simulations keep employees vigilant against evolving threats.
home.partners_heading: Trusted by teams and technology leaders

about.title: About
about.pageIntro: At SECURESIST, we believe cybersecurity starts with people. Technology matters, but real security is built when employees understand risks, make better decisions, and feel confident doing the right thing.
about.pagePlatform: SECURESIST is an all-in-one cybersecurity awareness and insider risk platform designed to train, test, and understand employee behavior. We combine engaging, interactive awareness programs with realistic simulated attacks and clear behavioral insights, helping organizations reduce human risk and build a lasting security culture.
about.pageBalance: We also know how hard it is to balance security, compliance, and productivity. That's why SECURESIST helps teams see what's really happening across their digital environments, without slowing people down or creating fear.
about.description: At Meta Techs, we recognize that the greatest defense against cyber threats is your people. We are dedicated to providing the tools and knowledge necessary to transform every employee into an active defender.

solution.title: Our Solution:
solution.description1: We created **SECURESIST**, our all-in-one cybersecurity awareness platform, to bridge the gap between technical security and human behavior.
solution.description2: SECURESIST helps organizations of all sizes build a **strong security culture** by turning employees from potential targets into **active defenders** through engaging, personalized, and effective training modules.

empowering.title: Empowering Teams
empowering.description: To make cybersecurity simple, engaging, and effective for every business, empowering teams with confidence.

expert.title: Expert-Led
expert.description: Developed by certified cybersecurity specialists with deep industry expertise.

people.title: People-First
people.description: Easy-to-follow, gamified training that speaks plain language, driving real behavior change.

cta.title: Ready to Get Started?
cta.description: Join hundreds of organizations that trust SECURESIST for their cybersecurity training needs.

stages.newTrainingCampaign: Launch and track new awareness campaigns (phishing, password hygiene, data handling) with targeted audiences and timelines.
stages.policyCompliance: Manage policies, attestations, and required controls (ISO 27001, NIST, PCI DSS, NCA, etc.) to stay audit-ready.
stages.executiveVIPProtection: Provide specialized training and controls for executives and high-risk roles to reduce BEC, impersonation, and fraud exposure.
stages.phishingSocialEngineering: Run simulations and monitor user behavior to reduce click rates and strengthen the reporting culture across the organization.
stages.riskControlGaps: Identify gaps from assessments, control testing, and exceptions, then assign owners, actions, and due dates.
stages.auditEvidenceReporting: Centralize evidence collection, generate compliance reports, and track remediation status for internal and external audits.

howItWorks.title: How It Works
howItWorks.p1: Our platform continuously monitors your digital footprint across all six critical security stages, providing real-time alerts and actionable intelligence.
howItWorks.p2: From the moment a new asset appears to the critical window of domain expiration, we ensure comprehensive visibility and protection across your entire attack surface.

solutions.title: Solutions
solutions.description: Protect your organization with awareness training, simulation attacks, and behavioral insights.

awareness.title: Cyber Security Awareness Training
awareness.intro: Cybersecurity isn't just an IT responsibility—it's a shared effort that starts with people. At SECURESIST, our Cyber Security Awareness Training helps employees understand real-world cyber risks and respond with confidence.
awareness.description: Our training goes beyond generic content. It's interactive, engaging, and tailored to the threats employees actually face: phishing, social engineering, unsafe browsing, and data handling.
awareness.bullet1: Educates employees on common and emerging cyber threats
awareness.bullet2: Encourages secure behavior without disrupting productivity
awareness.bullet3: Adapts to different roles, departments, and risk levels
awareness.bullet4: Reinforces learning through continuous training, not one-time sessions
awareness.closing: By combining short, practical lessons with ongoing reinforcement, SECURESIST helps organizations turn cybersecurity awareness into everyday habits. With SECURESIST Cyber Security Awareness Training, you don't just train employees—you build a strong security culture where people become the first line of defense.

simulation.title: Employee Attack Simulation
simulation.intro: Knowing about cyber threats is important; knowing how to respond in real situations is what truly reduces risk. SECURESIST's Employee Simulation Attacks safely test employee behavior by simulating real-world threats in a controlled environment.
simulation.description: Through realistic phishing emails, social engineering, and other simulated scenarios, SECURESIST helps organizations see how employees react and where vulnerabilities exist. These simulations are about learning and improving—not blaming.
simulation.organizationsCan: With SECURESIST Employee Simulation Attacks, organizations can:
simulation.bullet1: Test employee readiness against real-life cyber threats
simulation.bullet2: Identify high-risk behaviors and knowledge gaps
simulation.bullet4: Reduce the likelihood of successful attacks in real scenarios
simulation.closing: Each simulation is followed by immediate feedback and targeted learning. SECURESIST turns simulated attacks into learning moments, helping employees become more aware, prepared, and resilient.

analyze.title: Analyze Behavior
analyze.intro: Understanding employee behavior is key to reducing human risk. SECURESIST's Analyze Behavior solution helps organizations move beyond assumptions and gain real insight into how employees interact with security policies, training, and simulated threats.
analyze.description: By analyzing behavioral patterns across training participation, simulation results, and daily security actions, SECURESIST highlights where risks exist and where improvements are happening.
analyze.organizationsCan: With SECURESIST Analyze Behavior, organizations can:
analyze.bullet1: Identify risky behaviors before they lead to incidents
analyze.bullet2: Measure the effectiveness of awareness and training programs
analyze.bullet3: Spot trends across teams, roles, or departments
analyze.bullet4: Prioritize actions based on real behavioral insights
analyze.closing: The goal isn't surveillance—it's understanding. By turning behavior into insight, SECURESIST enables organizations to reduce insider risk, improve resilience, and build a more security-aware workforce.

howItWorks.title: How It Works
howItWorks.description: SECURESIST makes cybersecurity awareness simple and effective in just a few steps

step1.title: Set Up Your Program
step1.description: Choose your training goals, audience, and schedule. The platform is quick to configure and ready to launch.

step2.title: Deliver Engaging Training
step2.description: Employees receive short, interactive lessons and phishing simulations designed to fit into their daily workflow.

step3.title: Monitor Progress
step3.description: Track completion rates, quiz scores, and simulation results in easy-to-read dashboards.

step4.title: Identify Risks

step5.title: Strengthen Your Security Culture
step5.description: Over time, your workforce becomes more aware, more confident, and better equipped to stop cyber threats.
